com.quantimodo.tools.utils

Class CustomRemindersHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quantimodo.tools.utils.CustomRemindersHelper

  • public class CustomRemindersHelper
extends Object
    This class saves the custom reminders as preferences

      • existReminder

        public static boolean existReminder(android.content.Context context,
                    String id)
        Check if there is a reminder associated with the given id
        Parameters:
        context - the current app context
        id - the reminder/Variable id
        Returns:
        true if the reminder exist for that Variable id, false otherwise
